title: Wagered Woman
description: The book is based in a small town setting. Delilah Jones tries to prove to everyone especially herself; that she is a sophisticated career woman, who basically doesn't want to be like any of her rowdy brothers.For almost 20 years her and her enemy Sam Fletcher made a silent vow, by pretending the other wasn't there. Until one day Sam Fletcher who also despises her, comes into her life all of a sudden and breaks that vow. To make it worse Sam is every bit as wild as her brothers!
author: Christine Rimmer
